Posts.Content: finished imrt early dec 2012, having back pain. oncologist ordered new ct of pelvis and chest. found 3 new lymph nodes in pelvic area, 9 lesions in liver and 7 nodules in lungs! doc says 3-9 months to live..wow didn't see that coming. had chest ct done in aug 2010, didn;t show any cancer??? she also says most likely not from prostate tumor, but lung tumor as primary tumor...
